text.config.unloaded-activity.title: Unloaded Activity Settings
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.deb: If enabled, the mod will send more info in the logs.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.ran:
If enabled, the mod will update blocks in 
a random order to make updating slightly more realistic. 
This is only noticeable on things that gets affected by 
other things when they grow, like trees/saplings.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.rem:
If enabled, instead of looping through 
the entire chunk, it will remember the positions of 
supported blocks and loop through that. 
This can improve performance but it's experimental might break slightly.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.tic:
How many ticks are needed to be skipped before 
the mod should start simulating the ticks.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.max: How many chunks should be allowed to update per tick.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.upd:
When you skip a night then the Max Chunk Updates 
will be ignored.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.mul: Multiply Max Chunk Updates Per Player

Will multiply Max Chunk Updates with 
the amount of players online.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.gro:
If enabled, the mod will update crops 
when they get within simulation distance.

If enabled, the mod will update stems 
when they get within simulation distance.

If enabled, the mod will update saplings 
when they get within simulation distance.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.dec:
If enabled, the mod will decay leaves 
when they get within simulation distance.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.gro:
If enabled, the mod will grow amethyst on 
budding amethyst blocks when they get 
within simulation distance.

If enabled, the mod will update sweet berry bushes 
when they get within simulation distance.

If enabled, the mod will update cocoa beans 
when they get within simulation distance.

If enabled, the mod will update sugar canes 
when they get within simulation distance.

If enabled, the mod will grow bamboo 
when they get within simulation distance.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.age:
If enabled, the mod will age copper blocks 
when they get within simulation distance.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.hat:
If enabled, the mod will hatch turtle eggs 
when they get within simulation distance.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.acc:
Will age the turtles more accurately 
after being hatched from an egg. 
(Will cost roughly double the performance for simulating turtle eggs)
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.gro:
If enabled, the mod will grow plant stems 
when they get within simulation distance.

(Plant stems = glow berries & kelp)
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.upd:
If enabled, the mod will update furnaces 
when they start getting ticked again.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.age:
If enabled, the mod will age entities 
when they start getting ticked again.
text.config.unloaded-activity.option.ena:
If enabled, the mod will simulate random ticks. 
If you lack performance, disable this. 

(Disabling individual options won't bring 
as much performance gain as disabling this)

If enabled, the mod will simulate block entities. 

(Disabling individual options won't bring 
as much performance gain as disabling this)

If enabled, the mod will simulate random ticks. 

(Disabling individual options won't bring 
as much performance gain as disabling this)
